DOC.brief_title: Lumbar Stabilization , Strengthening Stretching Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To contrast efficacy three exercise program , segmental stabilization strengthen abdominal trunk muscle lumbar stretch pain , functional impairment , activation transversus abdominis muscle ( TrA ) , individual chronic low back pain . Design : Forty-five patient randomize three group namely : Segmental stabilization group ( ES ) ( transversus abdominis lumbar multifidus ) ( n=15 , mean age 42,02 ± 8,15 ) , superficial strengthen group ( FS ) ( rectus abdominis , oblique abdominal muscle erector spinae muscle ) ( n=15 , mean age 41,71±6,41 ) stretch group ( AL ) ( erector spinae , posterior connective tissue ischiotibials muscle ) ( n=15 mean age 41,53 ± 4,41 ) . Groups contrast regard pain ( visual analogical scale McGill pain questionnaire ) , functional disability ( Oswestry disability questionnaire ) TrA muscle activation capacity ( Pressure Biofeedback Unit = PBU ) . The program last 6 week , session happen twice week , duration 30 minute . Analysis variance use inter intragroup comparison . Significance level establish 5 % . Patients attend two weekly session six week evaluate pain ( visual analogue scale McGill Pain Questionnaire ) , functional disability ( Oswestry disability index ) , ability contract TrA ( Pressure biofeedback unit ) treatment . The treatment program consist 30 minute session . The Anova one-way Tukey´s Post Hoc use compare group . The significance level adopt 5 % .
